honors_and_awards.title: Global Startup Mentor Award Winner: Most Dedicated, Western Europe
honors_and_awards.description: Issued award as a top 4 mentor for Founder Institute in Western Europe and among 36 mentors awarded globally for 2022.

honors_and_awards.title: DataFest @ EDI 2020: WINNING TEAM, Best insight
honors_and_awards.description: Team Phoenix was tasked with exploring the societal impacts of COVID-19 beyond health outcomes. They decided to investigate whether there were surges in certain searches during the UK lockdown. While UK lockdowns began on March 23rd, they chose to study the March 1st - May 25th period, hypothesising that many people would have begun to change their search preferences 2-3 weeks before in anticipation. They limited the search period to May 25th, the day George Floyd died, so that‚Ä¶ Show more

honors_and_awards.title: Consulting Summit 2020 Top 3 Team
honors_and_awards.description: Participated in a challenging London-Based Consulting Case Competition bringing together the leading student consultancies from North-Western Europe. Our team came 3rd out of 32 participating teams.

honors_and_awards.title: Edinburgh Awards (Multiple)
honors_and_awards.description: Awards for contribution to student representation and assistance with university strategy with >126h of volunteers logged

honors_and_awards.title: Annual Edinburgh University Investment Banking Case Competition
honors_and_awards.description: Won the annual investment banking case competition where I was conducting M&A analysis and then pitching biopharmaceutical acquisition prospects. I was particularly commended for my extensive and thorough research, well formulated pitchbook and presentation skills.

honors_and_awards.title: Geopolitics and International Relations Prize
honors_and_awards.description: Awarded the Geopolitics and International Relations Prize for my continued research into global political changes, soft power influences and conflict resolutions. Particularly commended for my reports on post-colonial imperial influences, international decision making, nation states, superpowers and contesting spaces, all of which received 100% based off the supplementary research into underlying synergies in Human Geography.

honors_and_awards.title: UK Bebras Computational Thinking Challenge
honors_and_awards.description: Bebras is an international informatics and computational thinking competition. This competition made me think about the most efficient solutions to a combination of mathematical and computing problems. I took part in the competition two years in a row, both times earning certificates of distinction.

honors_and_awards.title: Computer Science Prize
honors_and_awards.description: I was awarded the Computer Science Prize for my continuous high performances in class and extra-curricular computer science activities. I was particularly commended for my Computing Project where I earned 100% for a business plan-proposal of an exotic animal shelter to be built in the UK and the corresponding database I created for it.

honors_and_awards.title: FMSP Maths Feast Competition
honors_and_awards.description: This was a challenging team competition oriented around mathematical, team-working and communication skills. My team performed well, coming 3rd from over 30 teams present in our regional group and we were presented with certificates commending our performance.
